cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 11th Nov 2025 (AWST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 11th Nov 2025 (AWST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Basic 6 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Mixed dorm Bunk Beds for 6 people with split system air conditioning, en suite bathroom & ceiling fans.  Linen is supplied.  $20 key deposit required, refundable on checkout. Towels and blankets are available to hire for a deposit.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Basic Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Bunk bed with double on the bottom and single on top, ensuite bathroom, TV, bar fridge.  Linen supplied on arrival

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
